name: Monster Bullets
description:
A VARIETY OF BULLETS




In Monster Bullets each monster type has a unique weakness. Become a gun slinging monster hunter and master the art of reading a situation and loading the right bullet for each monster.

GONZO MONSTERS




From radio entities that get inside your head to space spiders with hallucinogenic venom, encounter a wide range of creative and novel monsters. Complete your bestiary and uncover strategies and lore.

FEATURES


  • Multiplayer Coop
    Monster Bullets is built and balanced with single-player in mind but that doesn't mean you can't play with up to 5 friends!
  • Procedural Maps
    Navigate catacombs, forests, caves, and more in Monster Bullets. All layouts are procedurally generated to ensure that each run is different from the last!
  • Speed Running Timer
    Compete with your friends to see who can delve into the dungeon depths and slay the goblin king the fastest!
  • Endless Mode
    After slaying the goblin king, you can test your endurance and see how long you can make it in endless mode!
  • Gonzo Monsters
    Over 24 varied monsters from shapeshifting skinwalkers to lumbering trolls!
  • Dynamic Upgrades
    Over 24 upgrades with novel interactions for different monster archetypes.
